title: Riot's Loot Crafting=scam

replies.body: Yeah, it makes no sense why they would set this up. I mean if uou are spending money on the game. The quality of content you receive should equal just that.
Hextech was intended as free skins, so yes just like a pay to win its a scam
too bad that it's nobody's fault but your own

You can actually see how much you've spent on Riot XD they tell you ---> https://privacy.riotgames.com/en_US/data

And you should just wait for sales on skins. If you know the boxes are scamming you, why buy them in the first place?
Just play new champs you haven't got boxes on already and hope someone on you're team gets an S :P
Thank you for the website. Turns out I have spent $1500... What a shocker. Fk this loot crafting
